languages.text: "Закрой свой поганый рот, пустотный пес". {n}Огнеголосый? Нет, рано! Мне понятен твой гнев, но ты должен смирить его!{/n} "Что ты сказал про Лорд-капитана? {rt_mf|Того|Ту}, кто дает вам работу, пищу и кров? Наглые выродки! Я вижу, зачем вы тут собрались. И не позволю устроить еще одно восстание". {n}Зачем ты тянешься к {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}воксу{/g}?{/n} "Если не разойдетесь — я отдам приказ продуть палаты плазмадвигателя. У вас пять секунд. Уже четыре..."

traits.locale_text: "Закрой свой поганый рот, пустотный пес". {n}Пламенное сердце? Нет, стой, рано! Мне понятен твой гнев, но ты должен смирить его.{/n} "Смеете возводить хулу на Лорд-капитана? {mf|Того|Ту}, кто дает вам работу, пищу и кров? Неблагодарные! Я вижу, зачем вы тут собрались. И не позволю устроить еще одно восстание" {n}Зачем ты тянешься к воксу?{/n} "Если не отступитесь и не разойдетесь по домам — я отдам приказ продуть палаты плазмадвигателя. У вас пять секунд. Уже четыре..."

languages.text: "Shut your foul mouth, void dog." {n}Flaming Voice? No, it is too soon! I understand your anger, but you must temper it!{/n} "What did you say about the Lord Captain? The one who gives you work, food, and shelter? You insolent deadbeats! I can see why you have gathered here, and I will not let you start another rebellion." {n}Why are you reaching for your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-caster?{/n} "If you do not disperse, I will give the order to vent the plasma chambers. You have five seconds. Four..."
languages.original_text: "Закрой свой поганый рот, пустотный пес". {n}Огнеголосый? Нет, рано! Мне понятен твой гнев, но ты должен смирить его!{/n} "Что ты сказал про Лорд-капитана? {rt_mf|Того|Ту}, кто дает вам работу, пищу и кров? Наглые выродки! Я вижу, зачем вы тут собрались. И не позволю устроить еще одно восстание". {n}Зачем ты тянешься к {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}воксу{/g}?{/n} "Если не разойдетесь — я отдам приказ продуть палаты плазмадвигателя. У вас пять секунд. Уже четыре..."

I can see why you have gathered here, and I will not let you start another rebellion." {n}Why are you reaching for your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-caster?{/n} "If you do not disperse, I will give the order to vent the plasma chambers. You have five seconds. Four..."

"Shut your foul mouth, void dog." {n}A Flaming Heart? No, it is too soon! I understand your anger, but you must temper it!{/n} "What did you say about the Lord Captain? The one who gives you work, food and shelter? You insolent bastards! I can see why you have gathered here. And I will not let you start another rebellion." {n}Why are you reaching for the vox-caster?{/n} "If you do not disperse, I will give the order to vent the plasma drive chambers. You have five seconds. Four..."

"Shut your foul mouth, void dog." {n}Flaming Voice? No, it is too soon! I understand your anger, but you must temper it!{/n} "What did you say about the Lord Captain? The one who gives you work, food, and shelter? You insolent deadbeats! I can see why you have gathered here, and I will not let you start another rebellion." {n}Why are you reaching for your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-caster?{/n} "If you do not disperse, I will give the order to vent the plasma chambers. You have five seconds. Four..."

languages.text: "Haltet Euer dreckiges Maul, Leerehund. {n}Flammende Stimme? Nein, das ist zu früh! Ich verstehe Eure Wut, doch Ihr müsst sie zügeln!{/n} "Was habt Ihr über den Lord Captain gesagt? Über {rt_mf|den, der|die, die} Euch Arbeit, Essen und Unterkunft bietet? Ihr unverschämten Taugenichtse! Ich weiß, warum Ihr Euch hier versammelt habt, und ich lasse nicht zu, dass Ihr eine weitere Rebellion anzettelt." {n}Warum greift Ihr nach Eurem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Transmitter?{/n} "Wenn Ihr diese Versammlung nicht auflöst, gebe ich Befehl, den Sauerstoff aus den Plasmakammern abzupumpen. Ihr habt fünf Sekunden. Vier ..."
languages.original_text: "Shut your foul mouth, void dog." {n}Flaming Voice? No, it is too soon! I understand your anger, but you must temper it!{/n} "What did you say about the Lord Captain? The one who gives you work, food, and shelter? You insolent deadbeats! I can see why you have gathered here, and I will not let you start another rebellion." {n}Why are you reaching for your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-caster?{/n} "If you do not disperse, I will give the order to vent the plasma chambers. Ich verstehe Eure Wut, doch Ihr müsst sie zügeln!{/n} "Was habt Ihr über den Lord Captain gesagt? Über {mf|den, der|die, die} Euch Arbeit, Essen und Unterkunft bietet? Ihr unverschämten Taugenichtse! Ich weiß, warum Ihr Euch hier versammelt habt, und ich lasse nicht zu, dass Ihr eine weitere Rebellion anzettelt." {n}Warum greift Ihr nach Eurem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Transmitter?{/n} "Wenn Ihr diese Versammlung nicht auflöst, gebe ich Befehl, den Sauerstoff aus den Plasmakammern abzupumpen. Ihr habt fünf Sekunden. Vier ..."

languages.text: «Cierra tu sucia boca, perro del vacío». {n}¿Voz Llameante? ¡No, es muy pronto! ¡Comprendo su enfado, pero debe atemperarlo!{/n} «¿Qué has dicho de{rt_mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? ¿La persona que os da trabajo, comida y refugio? ¡Holgazanes insolentes! Ya sé para qué os habéis reunido aquí, y no permitiré que organicéis otra revuelta». {n}¿Por qué se lleva la mano al {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} amplificador?{/n} «Si no os dispersáis, daré la orden de ventilar las cámaras de plasma. Tenéis cinco segundos. Cuatro...».
languages.original_text: "Shut your foul mouth, void dog." {n}Flaming Voice? No, it is too soon! I understand your anger, but you must temper it!{/n} "What did you say about the Lord Captain? The one who gives you work, food, and shelter? You insolent deadbeats! I can see why you have gathered here, and I will not let you start another rebellion." {n}Why are you reaching for your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-caster?{/n} "If you do not disperse, I will give the order to vent the plasma chambers. You have five seconds. Four..."

traits.locale_text: «Cierra tu sucia boca, perro del vacío». {n}¿Voz Llameante? ¡No, es muy pronto! ¡Comprendo su enfado, pero debe atemperarlo!{/n} «¿Qué has dicho de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? ¿La persona que os da trabajo, comida y refugio? ¡Holgazanes insolentes! Ya sé para qué os habéis reunido aquí, y no permitiré que organicéis otra revuelta». {n}¿Por qué se lleva la mano al {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} amplificador?{/n} «Si no os dispersáis, daré la orden de ventilar las cámaras de plasma. Tenéis cinco segundos. Cuatro...».

languages.text: 「その汚い口を閉じろ、ヴォイドの犬め」{n}燃える声か？いや、あまりに早すぎる！お前の怒りは理解するが、それを抑えなければ！{/n}「ロード・キャプテンのことはどうだ？お前に仕事を、食い物を、シェルターをくれたんだよな？生意気な死にぞこないどもめ！お前らがここに集まった理由はわかってる。もう反乱は起こさせない」{n}なぜ{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}{/n}に手を伸ばしているんだ？「解散しないなら、プラズマチャンバーの廃棄命令を出す。5秒やろう。4…」
languages.original_text: "Shut your foul mouth, void dog." {n}Flaming Voice? No, it is too soon! I understand your anger, but you must temper it!{/n} "What did you say about the Lord Captain? The one who gives you work, food, and shelter? You insolent deadbeats! I can see why you have gathered here, and I will not let you start another rebellion." {n}Why are you reaching for your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-caster?{/n} "If you do not disperse, I will give the order to vent the plasma chambers. You have five seconds. Four..."

traits.locale_text: 「その汚い口を閉じろ、ヴォイドの犬め」{n}燃える声か？いや、あまりに早すぎる！お前の怒りは理解するが、それを抑えなければ！{/n}「ロード・キャプテンのことはどうだ？お前に仕事を、食い物を、シェルターをくれたんだよな？生意気な死にぞこないどもめ！お前らがここに集まった理由はわかってる。もう反乱は起こさせない」{n}なぜ{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}{/n}に手を伸ばしているんだ？「解散しないなら、プラズマチャンバーの廃棄命令を出す。5秒やろう。4…」

languages.text: “给我闭上你的臭嘴，你这只贱狗。”{n}“烈焰之声”？不行，现在还不是时候！{/n}“舰长大人给你吃穿，给你工作，让你有地方住，可你刚刚是怎么称呼{rt_mf|他|她}的？你们这群不知死活的懒蛋！我知道你们在这里想干什么，但我决不允许你们继续造反。”{n}你伸手拿{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}通讯器是要做什么？{/n}“你们要是再敢继续这么闹事，我马上下令把整个等离子驱动室减压。我只给你五个数的时间，四……”
languages.original_text: "Shut your foul mouth, void dog." {n}Flaming Voice? No, it is too soon! I understand your anger, but you must temper it!{/n} "What did you say about the Lord Captain? The one who gives you work, food, and shelter? You insolent deadbeats! I can see why you have gathered here, and I will not let you start another rebellion." {n}Why are you reaching for your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-caster?{/n} "If you do not disperse, I will give the order to vent the plasma chambers. You have five seconds. Four..."

traits.locale_text: “给我闭上你的臭嘴，你这只贱狗。”{n}“烈焰之声”？不行，现在还不是时候！{/n}“舰长大人给你吃穿，给你工作，让你有地方住，可你刚刚是怎么称呼{mf|他|她}的？你们这群不知死活的懒蛋！我知道你们在这里想干什么，但我决不允许你们继续造反。”{n}你伸手拿{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}通讯器是要做什么？{/n}“你们要是再敢继续这么闹事，我马上下令把整个等离子驱动室减压。我只给你五个数的时间，四……”

languages.text: « Ferme ta sale gueule, chien du vide. » {n}Timbre flamboyant ? Non, il est trop tôt ! Je comprends votre colère, mais vous devez la maîtriser !{/n} « Qu'avez-vous osé dire sur {rt_mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ? Comment pouvez-vous dénigrer {rt_mf|celui|celle} qui vous offre du travail, de la nourriture et un toit ? Bande d'insolents ! Je sais pourquoi vous vous êtes rassemblés ici, et je ne vous permettrai pas de déclencher une nouvelle rébellion. » {n}Pourquoi vous emparez-vous de votre émetteur {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} ?{/n} « Si vous ne vous dispersez pas sur le champ, je donnerai l'ordre d'évacuer les salles des réacteurs à plasma. Vous avez cinq secondes. Quatre... »
languages.original_text: "Shut your foul mouth, void dog." {n}Flaming Voice? No, it is too soon! I understand your anger, but you must temper it!{/n} "What did you say about the Lord Captain? The one who gives you work, food, and shelter? You insolent deadbeats! I can see why you have gathered here, and I will not let you start another rebellion." {n}Why are you reaching for your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-caster?{/n} "If you do not disperse, I will give the order to vent the plasma chambers. You have five seconds. Four..."

Je comprends votre colère, mais vous devez la maîtriser !{/n} « Qu'avez-vous osé dire sur {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ? Comment pouvez-vous dénigrer {mf|celui|celle} qui vous offre du travail, de la nourriture et un toit ? Bande d'insolents ! Je sais pourquoi vous vous êtes rassemblés ici, et je ne vous permettrai pas de déclencher une nouvelle rébellion. » {n}Pourquoi vous emparez-vous de votre émetteur {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} ?{/n} « Si vous ne vous dispersez pas sur le champ, je donnerai l'ordre d'évacuer les salles des réacteurs à plasma. Vous avez cinq secondes. Quatre... »

languages.text: "Kapa o iğrenç çeneni uçsuz iti." {n}Alazlı Ses? Hayır, daha vakti gelmedi! Öfkeni anlıyorum ama onu törpülemelisin!{/n} "Lord Kaptan hakkında ne dedin sen? Size iş, yiyecek ve sığınak verenden mi bahsediyorsun? Arsız beleşçiler sizi! Buraya niye toplandığınızı anlayabiliyorum. Bir isyana daha kalkışmanıza göz yummayacağım." {n}Neden elini {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksyayarına{/g} götürüyorsun?{/n} "Dağılmazsanız plazma odalarını tahliye etme emri vereceğim. Beş saniyeniz var. Dört..."
languages.original_text: "Shut your foul mouth, void dog." {n}Flaming Voice? No, it is too soon! I understand your anger, but you must temper it!{/n} "What did you say about the Lord Captain? The one who gives you work, food, and shelter? You insolent deadbeats! I can see why you have gathered here, and I will not let you start another rebellion." {n}Why are you reaching for your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-caster?{/n} "If you do not disperse, I will give the order to vent the plasma chambers. You have five seconds. Four..."
